meanings: (물건이) pile up, (가지런히) be stacked (up), (아무렇게나) be heaped (up)

vlive.korean: 형 이게 많이 쌓인 거야? It's accumulated much? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚
[쌓인 설거지] 오 마이 갓! [Dishes piled up] Oh my God! 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?
오늘 하루 쌓인 피로가 완전 싸~악 풀리실걸요? It will relieve all the fatigue from a long day. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 내 거잖아요, 이거 (Feat.선글라스) [가두리횟집] EP05
vlive.english: It will relieve all the fatigue from a long day.

vlive.korean: 겨울 처음인 거 같은데 - 많이 쌓인 것 같은데? It think it's the first time in this winter. - I think it's stacked up a lot. 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚
vlive.english: It think it's the first time in this winter. - I think it's stacked up a lot.

vlive.korean: [친구가 뭐라 하건 나의 길을 가는 뷔] - 안 됩니다 여러분 - 평소에 쌓인 게 많아... [V never stops] - It's not... - They have a long history. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.95
vlive.english: [V never stops] - It's not... - They have a long history.

examples.korean: My fall was cushioned by the deep snow. 발음듣기 깊이 쌓인 눈 때문에 내가 떨어질 때 충격이 덜했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My fall was cushioned by the deep snow. 발음

examples.korean: The road was blocked by deep drifts of snow. 발음듣기 도로는 깊이 쌓인 눈 더미들로 막혀 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The road was blocked by deep drifts of snow. 발음

examples.korean: deep water / snow 발음듣기 깊은 물/깊이 쌓인 눈 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
She was carrying a lot of emotional baggage. 발음듣기 그녀는 마음속에 쌓인 감정의 응어리가 많았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was carrying a lot of emotional baggage. 발음

examples.korean: Some roads are closed because of drifting. 발음듣기 일부 도로들이 바람에 날려 쌓인 눈 때문에 폐쇄되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some roads are closed because of drifting. 발음
